text:
In the fireside chat ‚ÄòThe Power and Potential of the U.S.-India Media, Gaming and Sports‚Äô, leaders from the world of media, gaming, and entertainment examined the growing convergence between U.S. and Indian creative industries. 

This timely conversation explored how emerging formats, real-time technologies, and cross-border co-productions are transforming immersive storytelling and unlocking new pathways for youth engagement.   

Panelists included Girish Menon (CEO, @JetSynthesys), Abhishek Malhotra (Managing Partner, @TMTLawPractice1), and Nitish @mittersain (CEO, @nazaradotcom), with moderation by Devyani Ozarde (Managing Director, Media & Entertainment, @AccentureIndia). 

The discussion underscored the immense potential of U.S.-India synergies in media, gaming, and sports, highlighting how both nations can co-create the future of global entertainment by leveraging their strengths in content, technology, and business.
